DOC.brief_title: Study Assessing Safety Immunogenicity IC43 Vaccination Against Pseudomonas Aeruginosa Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: The study design multi‐center , observer‐blinded , randomize , placebocontrolled phase 1 study healthy adult subject 18 65 year age . A total 160 healthy male female subject plan enrol randomized five group receive different dosage formulation IC43 placebo .
